MSA.name: Parties to the Agreement — Clearly define legal names and roles (Client vs. Service Provider)
MSA.clause_check: must clearly specify legal names of both Client and Service Provider

MSA.name: Scope of Services — Reference to SOWs or specific project documents; avoid vague descriptions
MSA.clause_check: must reference SOWs or project documents; should not be vague

MSA.name: Term and Termination — Duration of the MSA; termination for cause/convenience; notice period required
MSA.clause_check: termination notice period should be at least 30 days

MSA.name: Payment Terms — Invoicing process, payment due date, late fees, taxes, expenses, currency
MSA.clause_check: payment due date must not exceed 30 days from invoice

MSA.name: Change Management — Process to handle changes to services, scope, cost, or timelines
MSA.clause_check: all scope or cost changes must require written approval

MSA.name: Confidentiality — Mutual or one-way clause; time duration of obligation; exclusions
MSA.clause_check: confidentiality obligation must last at least 2 years after termination

MSA.name: Intellectual Property (IP) — Ownership of deliverables; pre-existing IP; licensing or assignment clauses
MSA.clause_check: ownership of deliverables must be assigned to the Client

MSA.name: Warranties — Quality standards, rework obligations, compliance with laws
MSA.clause_check: services must comply with applicable laws and professional standards

MSA.name: Indemnity — Who indemnifies whom, and for what (e.g., IP infringement, third-party claims)
MSA.clause_check: service provider must indemnify client for third-party IP infringement claims

MSA.name: Limitation of Liability — Cap on damages (e.g., fees paid in 12 months), exclusion of indirect/consequential damages
MSA.clause_check: liability cap must be at least equal to 12 months of fees

MSA.name: Dispute Resolution — Governing law, jurisdiction, mediation/arbitration before litigation
MSA.clause_check: must specify governing law and arbitration before litigation

MSA.name: Insurance Requirements — Minimum coverage levels, proof of insurance, types of policies
MSA.clause_check: provider must maintain minimum insurance coverage of $1,000,000

MSA.name: Subcontracting — Permission or restriction, responsibility for subcontractor actions
MSA.clause_check: subcontracting requires prior written consent of the client

MSA.name: Force Majeure — Coverage for unexpected events (natural disasters, strikes, etc.)
MSA.clause_check: clause must cover natural disasters and strikes as valid events

MSA.name: Audit Rights — Client’s right to audit compliance, data security, or invoices
MSA.clause_check: client must have right to audit provider’s compliance at least annually

MSA.name: Non-Solicitation — Restriction on hiring each other's employees for a defined time
MSA.clause_check: must restrict hiring of each other's employees for at least 12 months

MSA.name: Amendment Clause — Written amendments only; signed by authorized representatives
MSA.clause_check: amendments must be in writing and signed by both parties

MSA.name: Entire Agreement — Clause stating that MSA + SOWs form the complete agreement
MSA.clause_check: must state that MSA and SOWs form the complete agreement

NDA.name: Parties to the Agreement — Clearly identify disclosing and receiving parties
NDA.clause_check: must clearly specify both disclosing and receiving parties

NDA.name: Definition of Confidential Info — Broad but reasonable; includes tangible and intangible information
NDA.clause_check: definition must include both tangible and intangible information

NDA.name: Purpose — Clarifies why information is being disclosed (e.g., evaluation, negotiation, partnership)
NDA.clause_check: purpose must be explicitly stated and not left vague

NDA.name: Obligations of Receiving Party — Duty to protect, use limitations, and restrict disclosures to internal personnel
NDA.clause_check: receiving party must limit disclosure to internal personnel only

NDA.name: Exclusions — Common exclusions: publicly available, independently developed, legally disclosed
NDA.clause_check: exclusions must include publicly available and independently developed information

NDA.name: Term of Agreement — Duration of NDA obligation (e.g., 2–5 years); may differ from term of the relationship
NDA.clause_check: term must be at least 2 years from effective date

NDA.name: Return/Destruction — Obligation to return or destroy confidential info upon request or termination
NDA.clause_check: confidential information must be returned or destroyed upon request

NDA.name: No License Granted — Clarifies that no IP or rights are transferred through disclosure
NDA.clause_check: must state explicitly that no IP rights are granted

NDA.name: Remedies — Injunctive relief and legal remedies in case of breach
NDA.clause_check: remedies must include injunctive relief for breach

NDA.name: Governing Law — Jurisdiction under which the NDA will be interpreted and enforced
NDA.clause_check: must specify governing law and jurisdiction

SOW.name: Project Title and Parties — Clear identification of SOW, parties, and reference to governing MSA
SOW.clause_check: must clearly specify project title, parties, and reference to MSA

SOW.name: Scope of Services — Detailed description of deliverables, tasks, and objectives
SOW.clause_check: scope must include clear deliverables and objectives

SOW.name: Project Timeline — Start and end dates, key milestones, dependencies
SOW.clause_check: must specify both start and end dates

SOW.name: Deliverables — Detailed listing of all outputs with acceptance criteria
SOW.clause_check: all deliverables must have defined acceptance criteria

SOW.name: Assumptions and Constraints — Operational or client-specific dependencies
SOW.clause_check: assumptions must list key client dependencies explicitly

SOW.name: Roles and Responsibilities — Who is doing what on client and vendor sides
SOW.clause_check: roles must clearly define both client and vendor responsibilities

SOW.name: Resource Plan — Designation of named or unnamed personnel and roles, if applicable
SOW.clause_check: must specify named or role-based personnel assignments

SOW.name: Payment Schedule — Milestone-based, T&M, or fixed fee; invoicing terms
SOW.clause_check: payment schedule must align with milestones or defined terms

SOW.name: Change Control Process — Process to manage out-of-scope work or timeline/cost changes
SOW.clause_check: must require written approval for scope or cost changes

SOW.name: Acceptance Criteria — How work will be reviewed and approved by the client
SOW.clause_check: acceptance criteria must include client sign-off process

SOW.name: Reporting and Governance — Frequency and format of status updates, escalation matrix, stakeholder roles
SOW.clause_check: must specify reporting frequency and escalation matrix

SOW.name: Termination Clause — Right to terminate SOW separately from MSA, along with consequences
SOW.clause_check: must specify conditions for terminating SOW independently of MSA

PSA.name: Parties to the Agreement — Clearly identify legal names, registered addresses, and specific roles (Client, Consultant, Service Provider)
PSA.clause_check: must specify full legal names and roles of all parties

PSA.name: Scope of Work / Services — Define detailed deliverables, timelines, and responsibilities; reference specific SOWs; avoid ambiguous terms
PSA.clause_check: scope must include deliverables and timelines, not vague terms

PSA.name: Service Levels & KPIs — Specify measurable performance standards (e.g., response time, defect rates, milestones) and remedies for non-compliance
PSA.clause_check: must define at least one measurable KPI or performance standard

PSA.name: Term and Termination — Duration of the PSA; renewal conditions; termination for cause, convenience, or prolonged non-performance; notice requirements
PSA.clause_check: termination notice period must be at least 30 days

PSA.name: Fees and Payment Terms — Rate structure (hourly, daily, milestone-based); invoicing procedure; payment timelines; expenses; taxes; currency; escalation for late payment
PSA.clause_check: payment terms must not exceed 30 days from invoice

PSA.name: Change Control — Documented process for approving changes in deliverables, timelines, or costs; authorization levels
PSA.clause_check: all changes must be formally approved in writing

PSA.name: Confidentiality & Data Protection — Non-disclosure obligations; duration; permitted disclosures; data privacy compliance (GDPR, CCPA, etc.)
PSA.clause_check: confidentiality must last at least 2 years and comply with data protection laws

PSA.name: Intellectual Property Rights — Ownership of work product; use of pre-existing IP; licensing rights; transfer/assignment provisions
PSA.clause_check: ownership of deliverables must be assigned to the client

PSA.name: Warranties & Representations — Compliance with industry standards; lawful performance; accuracy of deliverables; rework obligations
PSA.clause_check: services must comply with laws and industry standards

PSA.name: Indemnification — Scope of indemnities (e.g., IP infringement, negligence, third-party claims); defense obligations; cost coverage
PSA.clause_check: service provider must indemnify client against third-party IP infringement claims

PSA.name: Limitation of Liability — Caps on damages; exclusions for indirect damages; carve-outs for intentional misconduct or confidentiality breaches
PSA.clause_check: liability cap must be at least equal to 12 months of fees

PSA.name: Dispute Resolution — Escalation process; mediation/arbitration clauses; governing law and jurisdiction; legal venue
PSA.clause_check: must specify governing law and arbitration before litigation

PSA.name: Insurance Requirements — Minimum insurance levels; proof of coverage; relevant policy types (professional liability, cyber, general liability)
PSA.clause_check: provider must maintain minimum insurance coverage of $1,000,000

PSA.name: Subcontracting & Assignment — Restrictions on subcontracting; prior approval needed; responsibility for subcontractors’ performance
PSA.clause_check: subcontracting requires prior written consent from client

PSA.name: Force Majeure — Excuses performance for unforeseeable events (natural disasters, political unrest, pandemics, etc.); notice requirements
PSA.clause_check: must explicitly include natural disasters and pandemics as valid events

PSA.name: Audit & Inspection Rights — Client’s rights to review performance, security compliance, and billing accuracy
PSA.clause_check: client must have audit rights at least annually

PSA.name: Non-Solicitation / Non-Compete — Restrictions on recruiting each other’s employees or soliciting business from clients for a defined period
PSA.clause_check: must restrict employee solicitation for at least 12 months

PSA.name: Compliance with Laws — Adherence to applicable labor, export control, anti-bribery, and data protection laws
PSA.clause_check: provider must comply with all applicable laws and regulations

PSA.name: Amendments & Waivers — All modifications in writing; signed by authorized representatives; waiver clauses
PSA.clause_check: amendments must be in writing and signed by both parties

PSA.name: Entire Agreement — States PSA (plus applicable SOWs) constitutes the full agreement; supersedes prior discussions or documents
PSA.clause_check: must state PSA and SOWs form the complete agreement

OTHERS.name: Parties to the Agreement — Clearly state legal names, addresses, and roles of each party
OTHERS.clause_check: must clearly specify legal names and roles of all parties

OTHERS.name: Purpose / Scope — Briefly define what the agreement is about and its intended scope
OTHERS.clause_check: purpose must be explicitly defined and not vague

OTHERS.name: Term & Termination — Duration of the agreement, renewal conditions, termination rights, and notice period
OTHERS.clause_check: termination notice period should be at least 30 days

OTHERS.name: Fees / Payment Terms — Payment structure, invoicing process, due dates, late fees, and applicable taxes
OTHERS.clause_check: payment due date must not exceed 30 days from invoice

OTHERS.name: Change Management — Process to request and approve changes in scope, cost, or timelines
OTHERS.clause_check: changes must require prior written approval

OTHERS.name: Confidentiality — Obligations to protect information, permitted disclosures, and duration of confidentiality
OTHERS.clause_check: confidentiality obligation must last at least 2 years after termination

OTHERS.name: Intellectual Property Rights — Ownership of deliverables, pre-existing IP, and licensing terms
OTHERS.clause_check: ownership of deliverables must be assigned to the client

OTHERS.name: Warranties & Representations — Quality standards, compliance with laws, and accuracy of information
OTHERS.clause_check: services must comply with applicable laws and professional standards

OTHERS.name: Indemnification — Responsibility for losses, damages, or third-party claims
OTHERS.clause_check: service provider must indemnify client for third-party claims

OTHERS.name: Limitation of Liability — Caps on damages and exclusions for indirect/consequential losses
OTHERS.clause_check: liability cap must be at least equal to 12 months of fees

OTHERS.name: Compliance with Laws — Adherence to relevant laws and regulations (e.g., labor, data privacy)
OTHERS.clause_check: agreement must require compliance with applicable laws and regulations

OTHERS.name: Dispute Resolution — Governing law, jurisdiction, and process for resolving disputes (mediation/arbitration)
OTHERS.clause_check: must specify governing law and arbitration before litigation

OTHERS.name: Insurance — Minimum coverage requirements and proof of insurance
OTHERS.clause_check: provider must maintain minimum insurance coverage of $1,000,000

OTHERS.name: Subcontracting / Assignment — Rules for engaging subcontractors or transferring obligations
OTHERS.clause_check: subcontracting or assignment requires prior written consent of the client

OTHERS.name: Force Majeure — Protection from liability for events beyond reasonable control
OTHERS.clause_check: clause must cover natural disasters and strikes as valid events

OTHERS.name: Audit Rights — Rights to verify compliance, performance, or billing
OTHERS.clause_check: client must have right to audit provider’s compliance at least annually

OTHERS.name: Non-Solicitation / Non-Compete — Restrictions on hiring or competing with the other party
OTHERS.clause_check: must restrict hiring of each other's employees for at least 12 months

OTHERS.name: Amendments — All changes must be in writing and signed by authorized representatives
OTHERS.clause_check: amendments must be in writing and signed by both parties

OTHERS.name: Entire Agreement — States that this agreement (plus attachments) is the full understanding between the parties
OTHERS.clause_check: must state that the agreement and attachments form the complete agreement

OTHERS.name: Signatures — Names, titles, and dates for authorized signatories of each party
OTHERS.clause_check: must include names, titles, and dates of all signatories
